title: The Title Element
text:
The <title> element adds a title 
to your page:

Example

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html><head>
 
<title>HTML Tutorial</title>
 </head>
<body>
The content of the document......
</body>
</html>

The title is shown in the browser's title bar:

examples.heading: Example
examples.code:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html><head>
 
<title>HTML Tutorial</title>
 </head>
<body>
The content of the document......
</body>
</html>

title: What is a Good Title?
text: The title should describe the content and the meaning of the page.

The page title is very important for search engine optimization 
(SEO). The text is used by search engine algorithms to decide the order 
when listing pages in search results.
So, try to make the title as accurate and meaningful as possible!

title: HTML Title Tag
text: For a complete list of all available HTML tags, visit our HTML Tag Reference.
